name: Trial Line
description:
CONTROLS
Use MOUSE CLICK to shift angle.

GAMEPLAY
With each click you change direction. World is generating randomly. There are two type of attribute tiles. The first changes your angle( + 5/10/15/20/25/30 degrees) and the second one changes your forward moving speed(+ 10/20/30/40/50%). You get points by moving forward. Each time you click to shif angle, you lose 1 point. Try to keep angle changes to minimum for maximum score.

CREDITS
Game made by us in late 2018.
